q1: How does the date difference calculator work?
a1: Enter a start date and an end date, and the calculator computes the exact difference in years, months, days, weeks, hours, and minutes.
a2: No, the calculator uses the absolute difference between the two dates regardless of which comes first.
q3: Does it account for leap years?
a3: Yes, all calculations properly account for leap years and varying month lengths.
a4: Currently the calculator shows calendar days. Business day calculation may be added in a future update.
a5: Yes, all calculations happen locally in your browser. No data is transmitted.
